list.title: BarChartGraphic
list.description: Component that render the bar chart It shows the weight and the calories burned by the user

list.title: Connexion
list.description: This is the connexion page of the SportSee app, you can select an account or add a new one

list.title: getDataAPI
list.description: Function that retrieve user data from the local API and save it in userData

list.title: getMockedData
list.description: Function that retrieve user infos from the mocked data and save it in userData

list.title: LineChartGraphic
list.description: Component that render a line chart It shows the average duration of user sessions day by day

list.title: RadarChartGraphic
list.description: Component that render the radar chart It shows the capacities of the user in 5 categories : cardio, intensity, speed, strengh, endurance and energy

list.title: RadialBarChartGraphic
list.description: Component that render the radial bar chart It shows the user's progress with a percentage
